import React from 'react' import './Showall.css' import Sidebar from './Sidebar' import Buttons from './Buttons' import FetchAPI from './FetchAPI' // import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function Showalladmin({ name }) { const [data] = FetchAPI("http://localhost:8000/api/show-all-admin") return (

{name}

<>S.R. No. {/* Profile */} <>Name <>ID <>Office Email <>Contact Number <>Position <>Documents <>Edit <>Delete
{ data.map((data,index)=>{ return(
{/* {index+1} */} {/* */} {index+1} {data.name} {data.employee_id} {data.office_email} {data.contact_no} {data.designation}
) }) }
) } export default Showalladmin
